mapper.select: SELECT FREENO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, IP, HIT FROM FREE ORDER BY FREENO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE (FREENO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, IP, HIT) VALUES (FREE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{ip}, #{hit})
mapper.select: SELECT A.RANK, A.FREENO, A.WRITER, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.IP, A.HIT FROM (SELECT RANK() OVER(ORDER BY AVE DESC) AS RANK, FREENO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, IP, HIT FROM FREE) A WHERE A.RANK <= 1
